Articles.Content:
At seemingly random times, resolution auto changes from 2560x1440 borderless to 3440 x1440. I'm having to manually set it back to 2560x1440 (perks of having to record footage for Youtube).

I'm using a Nvidia graphics card with GEFORCE Experience installed. I've now changed the optimal resolution settings just in case it is causing the issue.  Will post an update if it resolves the problem.

 

OS: Windows 11

Graphics card: RTX 4090

KSP Version: This occurs for both versions.
